attributes.action: scrap his plans to introduce the Broadband Tax of (initially) 50p per month on our phone bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is this government proposing yet another 'stealth tax' on decent hard working people, by introducing a 50p a month charge on our phone bills. If it starts there, what's to say it will increase over the years? We are already taxed on virtually everything we buy/use. This time it has to stop before it happens. Please sign if you agree.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
